title: ‘Survivor’ Season 43, Episode 4
description:
Tyson and Riley are joined by three-time ‘Survivor’ veteran Jerri Manthey to discuss this season’s third episode. They explain the importance of being self-aware, talk about how the show has pivoted away from villainizing players, and share their opinions regarding some of this season’s questionable editing decisions.

Hosts: Tyson Apostol and Riley McAtee
Guest: Jerri Manthey
Producers: Jessie Lopez and Kai Grady
